name: 欧文·迈尔
introduction: Owen started acting in 2017 and has since been featured in many music videos, short films, commercials, Indie films and TV series including: NOS4A2 (2019), Alternate Ground (feature: 2020), Reflections (2019), They Don't Know (2018), Born in Darkness (2018), Hemiola (2018), Checkmate (2018), Safe in the Moonlight (2018) When the Music Stops (2018), Welcome Home (2018) Owen is also a baseball player and a 2 time National title winning hip hop dancer. He recently filmed an additional lead role in a feature film that will be released in 2020. After just turning 14 he started writing his own script for a feature length "coming of age" film titled "14". Filming has begun and this is expected to be released in 2020. It has been his dream to write and direct as well as continuing to act in television and film.
